description: NameBank is a "biological name server" focused on storing names and objectively-derived nomenclatural attributes. NameBank is a repository for all recorded names including scientific names, vernacular (or common names), misspelled names, as well as ad-hoc nomenclatural labels that may have limited context.
name: uBio NameBank

resources.description: uBio NameBank at The Marine Biological Laboratory

institution.description: The Marine Biological Laboratory (MBL) is dedicated to scientific discovery â€“ exploring fundamental biology, understanding biodiversity and the environment, and informing the human condition through research and education. Founded in Woods Hole, Massachusetts in 1888, the MBL is a private, nonprofit institution and an affiliate of the University of Chicago.
institution.name: Marine Biological Laboratory, Woods Hole, Massachusetts
